description: Impose Last Interglacial (127 kyr ago) boundary conditions for the atmospheric concentration of well-mixed greenhouse gases and orbital parameters.  Run for at least 100 years after spin-up. It is mandatory that the model versions used for the PMIP-CMIP6 experiments are the exactly the same as for the other CMIP6 experiments, in particular the DECK and historical simulations.
rationale: Evalute climate model for warm period, high sea-level stand.  Evaluate impacts of climate on sea ice and ice sheets. Help to determine the interplay of warmer atmospheric and oceanic temperatures, changed precipitation, and changed surface energy balance on ice sheet thermodynamics and dynamics.
